patthana19.7:4.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:5.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:6.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.7:6.2: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
